front.title: Home Documents for HTTP Services: XML Syntax

abstract.t: The current draft for HTTP Home Documents provides a JSON syntax only. This draft provides an XML syntax for the same underlying data model, so that the concept of HTTP Home Documents can be consistently exposed in both JSON- and XML-based HTTP services.Note to Readers Please discuss this draft on the apps-discuss mailing list [1]. Online access to all versions and files is available on github [2].
